author: Chris Titus Tech
description:
Yet another workaround for removal of shorts, playables, and other terrible design decisions from Google. 

Here is link to extenstion: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/enhancer-for-youtube/ponfpcnoihfmfllpaingbgckeeldkhle?hl=en-US

Let me know any other workarounds you may use.

title: How to Remove YouTube shorts in 2025
